gt_text: Gear up for a new year!  Back to School Bundle  Get 5 must-have items for under $5  Student favorites  Limited-time discounts
juding_criteria:
Here is a bullet list of required concrete visual elements:

*   Poster title "Back to School Bundle" (bold white chalk-style, top center)
*   Banner with "Gear up for a new year!" text (hand-drawn yellow font, above title)
*   Callout with "Get 5 must-have items for under $5" text (red text on white background, below title)
*   Student character
*   Full backpack (beside student character)
*   Notebooks
*   Colorful pens
*   Snacks
*   Calendar marked "September"
*   Classroom chalkboard in background
*   Subtle doodles on chalkboard
*   Motivational quotes on chalkboard
*   Brand logo (top left corner)
*   Text phrase "Student favorites" (bottom of poster)
*   Text phrase "Limited-time discounts" (bottom of poster)
*   QR code (bottom of poster, for direct shopping)
